short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered assistant to create clothing resale listings on Depop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your Depop resale listings with Relish's resale listing assistant! Relish generates listing descriptions, hashtags, categories and more. Relish offers these real-time suggestions right inside the Depop "create a listing" page.
 
Here's how it works!

->Depop is a popular clothing resale platform, but the current process to "create a listing" is time and labor intensive! That's where Relish comes in. 

-> First, you open the URL of the product that you'd like to resell (or a similar product).

-> Then, you open Relish and press "copy".

-> Next, you head to Depop and open the "create a listing" page.

-> Finally, you open Relish and press "paste". From there, Relish will generate a description and suggest items for each drop down menu on the "create a listing" page form.
